item.description:
Get psyched for shredding season and come watch the most progressive big mountain snowboarding film to date, "Deeper", by Teton Gravity Research (TGR)!
Comp ticket to Sugarbush Resort for everyone in attendance!

Follow Jeremy Jones and other top freeriders as they travel to the world's snowboarding meccas and venture past the boundaries of helicopters, snowmobiles, and lifts to explore untouched realms. Hang on tight as Jeremy faces the biggest challenges he has ever encountered in snowboarding. All night hikes, sleeping on peaks, camping 65 miles from civilization, 20 below temperatures, 10 day storms, and 20 mile days bring the adventure back into riding. Deeper puts the viewer in the athletes' boots, from the trials and tribulations to mind-boggling breakthroughs in the sport of snowboarding.

MOVIE TICKETS:
We will be attending the 6:45 p.m. show on Nov 30.
Tickets are $20 and available online without surcharge. Click here to buy tickets in advance

MEET US AT:
The Chart House Restaurant for drinks and appetizers from 5:15 to 6:15 p.m. Click here for more info on the Chart House, including happy hour menu
OR
The IMAX theater at the Boston Aquarium at 6:25 p.m. We'll be heading into the show at 6:30 p.m.

AFTERWARDS: After the show some of us we be heading over to the Sail Loft (80 Atlantic Avenue). Good food...good times. We have reserved some space. Come one...come all.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for members who will be wearing their Wedeln Ski and Outdoors clothing gear
item.name: Teton Gravity Research Movie: "Deeper" at IMAX Boston Aquarium
